thread.section_title: Alarm Grid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alarm Grid | www.alarmgrid.com
thread.title: David P
thread.title_full: Alarm Grid reviewed by David P

author: David P
title: David P
text:
I try to so alot of diy stuff whether it be to save money, for knowledge and experience, or because now or days you don't know who you can trust from the professional sector.
Alarmgrid in my very honest opinion embodies the diy spirit with their very helpful and knowledgeable staff, to the slew of information on the site, and lastly to the tons of helpful instructional videos where you get to put names to a few of the faces that you would talk to over at alarmgrid.
Keep up the great work alarmgrid oh and did I mention they try to be accomodating if they can when it comes to scheduling stuff.
